product_name: Native Eyewear Bigfork Reflex Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Native Eyewear Bigfork Reflex Polarized sunglasses feature a wide fit, perfect for those with a larger face and features. Interchangeable lens system lets you switch out lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities. Includes 1 set of polarized Reflex lenses and 1 set of SportFlex(TM) lenses, for a total of 2 sets of lenses. Grey-tint polarized Reflex lenses work well in extremely bright sunlight to reduce glare. Reflex lenses block 40% of infrared light to decrease eye fatigue, offer blue light filtering and 100% UV protection to minimize haze and enhance clarity. Additional SportFlex orange-yellow lenses have a mirror coating suitable for a range of low lighting(TM)cloudy, overcast, dusk and dawn. Lenses and lightweight, yet durable frames are built to withstand a high-velocity impact. Frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Self-adjusting nosepads and ear stems create a nonslip grip that keeps sunglasses in place, ensuring a soft feel and personalized fit. Temple ends hug behind your ears to keep sunglasses in place. Cam-action spring hinges quickly lock temples into position. Native Eyewear Bigfork Reflex polarized sunglasses include a protective case and a soft pouch that doubles as a cleaning cloth. Frames best fit large to extra large profiles.
short_description: The Native Eyewear Bigfork Reflex Polarized sunglasses feature a wide fit, perfect for those with a larger face and features.
